entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Oxbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
